NEO4J_URL.description: Used by endpoint and sync. URL of the Neo4J graph database server, including authentication details. e.g. neo4j+s://user:pass@host:1234

NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION.description: Used by npm. Install `devDependencies` on Heroku, so `npm build` runs `webpack` correctly.

NODE_ENV.description: Used by node. Standard way to choose environments on Node.js. Auto-generated by Heroku.

GRADLE_TASK.description: Used by gradle buildpack. Tasks used to build the project with gradlew. See buildSrc > publishSlimJar. See https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/deploying-gradle-apps-on-heroku.
